Meta.title: ONYX ‚Äî nicotine-free hookah blend
Meta.description: ONYX ‚Äî a nicotine-free hookah blend made from hibiscus with natural flavors. A tobacco alternative offering pure taste, vibrant vibe, and a new style of relaxation.

HeaderSection.title: ONYX ‚Äî it‚Äôs a vibe
HeaderSection.subTitle: Neon, style, atmosphere. We‚Äôre not like the others ‚Äî and neither are you.

1.title: Heat Under Control
1.description: ONYX easily handles three coals. Maximum heat ‚Äî stable results.

2.title: Says "MANGO"? You‚Äôll get mango
2.description: No surprises. What‚Äôs on the label is exactly what you‚Äôll taste.

3.title: A session that doesn‚Äôt end
3.description: Up to 2 hours of stable vibes. No need to repack.

4.title: Analog Flavor
4.description: Authentic taste. Only genuine fruits and berries.

5.title: More vapor ‚Äî more atmosphere
5.description: ONYX fills the space with smoke so thick it becomes part of it.

6.title: A care-free hookah experience
6.description: ONYX is heat-resistant, stable, and requires no attention. Perfect for hookah lounges and HoReCa.

pinkman.name: Pinkman
pinkman.description: Sweet-berry citrus with a bright mix of grapefruit, raspberry, and strawberry.

supernova.name: Supernova
supernova.description: Intense ice effect without its own flavor; adds deep coolness to any mix and refreshes solo.

banana.name: Banana
banana.description: Ripe banana with soft creaminess on the exhale and a rounded, sweet aftertaste.

energy.name: Energy
energy.description: Classic energy drink taste: citrus sweetness and a sparkling boost.

kiwi.name: Kiwi
kiwi.description: Juicy kiwi with a sweet-sour balance and fresh green notes; versatile for mixes.

lemongrass.name: Lemongrass
lemongrass.description: Light herbal aroma with a refreshing lemon accent.

strawberry.name: Strawberry
strawberry.description: Ripe strawberry with natural berry notes and a clean profile ‚Äî no artificial flavor.

lemon.name: Lemon
lemon.description: Bright lemon with expressive citrus and a clean, pleasant sour aftertaste.

peach.name: Peach Tea
peach.description: Soft black tea with ripe peach; no cooling, long velvety aftertaste.

pineapple.name: Pineapple
pineapple.description: That very taste of pineapple rings: juicy, bright-tropical, with a light tang.

mango.name: Mango Yogurt
mango.description: Dessert-like mango with creamy yogurt notes; rich and delicate profile.

grape.name: Grape
grape.description: Deep, berry-sweet taste with a distinct grape aftertaste, free from candy-like artificial notes.

wild.name: Wild Strawberry
wild.description: Delicate berry flavor with a light tang and the characteristic aroma of wild strawberries.
